title: Japan Anime Shoten
welcome: Delivering Japanese Anime Figures to the World
hero_subtitle: Delivering authentic products sourced directly from authorized channels, from rare figures to the latest merchandise.
hero_subtitle_1: Fresh arrivals of the hottest anime figures.
hero_subtitle_2: We stock hard-to-find limited editions and rare merchandise.
shop_intro_text: Japan Anime Shoten is your premier destination for authentic anime figures, trading cards, and exclusive merchandise. Sourced directly from Tokyo, we ensure every item is 100% genuine and shipped with care.
footer_subscribe_text: Subscribe to get special offers, free giveaways, and once-in-a-lifetime deals.

sections.title: Returns
content: Returns are accepted only if contacted within 7 days of arrival.
Items must be unopened to be eligible for return.
Opened items cannot be returned.
Return shipping costs are the responsibility of the customer.

sections.title: Non-returnable Items
content: Items where 8 or more days have passed since arrival.
Items that have been opened or used.
Items damaged or soiled by the customer.
Sale items or special price items (marked as non-returnable).

sections.title: Refunds
content: Refunds will be processed within 7 business days after receiving the returned item.
Refund amount depends on the condition of the item.
Full refund for unopened items in good condition.
Partial refunds may apply if there are issues with the item.
Refunds will be issued to the original payment method.

sections.title: Defective or Damaged Items
content: Please contact us within 7 days of arrival if the item is damaged or defective.
We will cover return shipping costs for defective or damaged items.
We will offer an exchange or full refund.

sections.title: Return Process
content: Please contact japan.anime.shoten@gmail.com.
Include your order number, item name, and reason for return.
We will provide the return address.
Please ship the item back to us.

sections.title: Shipping Methods
content: We primarily use Japan Post International ePacket Light.
Some items are shipped via EMS (Express Mail Service).
All items come with a tracking number.

sections.title: Shipping Time
content: Orders are shipped within 5-7 business days after confirmation.
Delivery usually takes 7-16 days after shipment.
Delivery items may vary depending on the destination country or region.
Delays may occur during busy seasons or due to customs inspections.

sections.title: Tracking
content: A tracking number will be sent via email after shipment.
You can check the status via Japan Post Tracking Service.
Tracking is also available via your local postal service.

sections.title: Shipping Cost
content: Shipping costs are included in all product prices.
Shipping will be displayed as 0 JPY at checkout.

sections.title: Shipping Destinations
content: We currently ship to the following countries/regions:
USA, Canada, UK, France, Germany, Italy, Spain
Taiwan, China, South Korea, Thailand, Singapore
Please contact us for shipping to other countries.

sections.title: Customs & Import Taxes
content: Customs duties or import taxes may apply depending on the destination country.
Customers are responsible for any customs and import taxes.
Amounts vary by country regulations.

sections.title: Undeliverable Items
content: Items returned due to unknown address or refusal of receipt will be returned to us.
Additional shipping fees are required for reshipment.
This also applies to returns due to long-term absence.

sections.title: Shipping Inquiries
content: Please contact japan.anime.shoten@gmail.com.
Include your tracking number and order number.

sections.title: Information Collection
content: We collect the following personal information:
Name, email address, shipping address, phone number
Order history, payment information
This is used solely for order processing and shipping.

sections.title: Third-Party Provision

We provide necessary information to payment processors (Shopify).

sections.title: Information Protection
content: We implement appropriate security measures.
We use SSL encryption.
We prevent unauthorized access, loss, destruction, and falsification.
